title: Review: StarTech’s first Thunderbolt 4 dock delivers 8K display support and future-proof I/O
content:
Late last year, StarTech launched its very first Thunderbolt 4 dock. Since then its lofty has been met with some newfound competition. One thing those lower-cost options can’t quite match, though, is the features, which set StarTech’s Mac upgrade apart thanks to up to 8K display output, 96W power passthrough, and a three Thunderbolt 4 ports, amongst other I/O. Now we’re going hands-on to see how the premium package stacks up.

more…

The post Review: StarTech’s first Thunderbolt 4 dock delivers 8K display support and future-proof I/O appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: StarTech Thunderbolt 4 Dock arrives with a premium build and 8K display-focused feature set to justify its lofty price tag.
